name: King's Squire
title: Teachings of the Forest: King's Squire
desc: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow.\n"Remember, this whole world is but a dream of the forest... Please pass on the forest's language and the responsibility of protecting the King's land to future successors."

skills.desc:
Character deals +1 DMG.
When played: The character to which this is attached will spend 2 less Elemental Dice next time they use an Elemental Skill or equip a Talent card.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)
